member.summary: The "activities" collection of methods.

member.summary: The service which this resource belongs to.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.#ctor(Google.Apis.Services.IClientService)
member.summary: Constructs a new resource.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.List
member.summary: Returns a list of activities visible to the current logged in user. Visible activities are determined by the visiblity settings of the object that was acted on, e.g. Drive files a user can see. An activity is a record of past events. Multiple events may be merged if they are similar. A request is scoped to activities from a given Google service using the source parameter.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest
member.summary: Returns a list of activities visible to the current logged in user. Visible activities are determined by the visiblity settings of the object that was acted on, e.g. Drive files a user can see. An activity is a record of past events. Multiple events may be merged if they are similar. A request is scoped to activities from a given Google service using the source parameter.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.#ctor(Google.Apis.Services.IClientService)
member.summary: Constructs a new List request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.DriveAncestorId
member.summary: Identifies the Drive folder containing the items for which to return activities.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.DriveFileId
member.summary: Identifies the Drive item to return activities for.

members.member: Indicates the strategy to use when grouping singleEvents items in the associated combinedEvent object. [default: driveUi]

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.GroupingStrategyEnum
member.summary: Indicates the strategy to use when grouping singleEvents items in the associated combinedEvent object.

members.member: The maximum number of events to return on a page. The response includes a continuation token if there are more events. [default: 50]

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.PageToken
member.summary: A token to retrieve a specific page of results.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.ActivitiesResource.ListRequest.Source
member.summary: The Google service from which to return activities. Possible values of source are: - drive.google.com

members.member: Indicates the user to return activity for. Use the special value me to indicate the currently authenticated user. [default: me]

member.summary: Gets the method name.

member.summary: Gets the REST path.

member.summary: Initializes List parameter list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Activity
member.summary: An Activity resource is a combined view of multiple events. An activity has a list of individual events and a combined view of the common fields among all events.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Activity.CombinedEvent
member.summary: The fields common to all of the singleEvents that make up the Activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Activity.SingleEvents
member.summary: A list of all the Events that make up the Activity.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Activity.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event
member.summary: Represents the changes associated with an action taken by a user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.AdditionalEventTypes
member.summary: Additional event types. Some events may have multiple types when multiple actions are part of a single event. For example, creating a document, renaming it, and sharing it may be part of a single file- creation event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.EventTimeMillis
member.summary: The time at which the event occurred formatted as Unix time in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.FromUserDeletion
member.summary: Whether this event is caused by a user being deleted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.Move
member.summary: Extra information for move type events, such as changes in an object's parents.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.PermissionChanges
member.summary: Extra information for permissionChange type events, such as the user or group the new permission applies to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.PrimaryEventType
member.summary: The main type of event that occurred.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.Rename
member.summary: Extra information for rename type events, such as the old and new names.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.Target
member.summary: Information specific to the Target object modified by the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.User
member.summary: Represents the user responsible for the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Event.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.ListActivitiesResponse
member.summary: The response from the list request. Contains a list of activities and a token to retrieve the next page of results.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.ListActivitiesResponse.Activities
member.summary: List of activities.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.ListActivitiesResponse.NextPageToken
member.summary: Token for the next page of results.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.ListActivitiesResponse.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Move
member.summary: Contains information about changes in an object's parents as a result of a move type event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Move.AddedParents
member.summary: The added parent(s).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Move.RemovedParents
member.summary: The removed parent(s).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Move.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Parent
member.summary: Contains information about a parent object. For example, a folder in Drive is a parent for all files within it.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Parent.Id
member.summary: The parent's ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Parent.IsRoot
member.summary: Whether this is the root folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Parent.Title
member.summary: The parent's title.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Parent.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission
member.summary: Contains information about the permissions and type of access allowed with regards to a Google Drive object. This is a subset of the fields contained in a corresponding Drive Permissions object.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.Name
member.summary: The name of the user or group the permission applies to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.PermissionId
member.summary: The ID for this permission. Corresponds to the Drive API's permission ID returned as part of the Drive Permissions resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.Role
member.summary: Indicates the Google Drive permissions role. The role determines a user's ability to read, write, or comment on the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.Type
member.summary: Indicates how widely permissions are granted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.User
member.summary: The user's information if the type is USER.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.WithLink
member.summary: Whether the permission requires a link to the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Permission.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.PermissionChange
member.summary: Contains information about a Drive object's permissions that changed as a result of a permissionChange type event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.PermissionChange.AddedPermissions
member.summary: Lists all Permission objects added.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.PermissionChange.RemovedPermissions
member.summary: Lists all Permission objects removed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.PermissionChange.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Photo
member.summary: Photo information for a user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Photo.Url
member.summary: The URL of the photo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Photo.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Rename
member.summary: Contains information about a renametype event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Rename.NewTitle
member.summary: The new title.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Rename.OldTitle
member.summary: The old title.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Rename.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Target
member.summary: Information about the object modified by the event.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Target.Id
member.summary: The ID of the target. For example, in Google Drive, this is the file or folder ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Target.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the target.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Target.Name
member.summary: The name of the target. For example, in Google Drive, this is the title of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.Target.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User
member.summary: A representation of a user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.IsDeleted
member.summary: A boolean which indicates whether the specified User was deleted. If true, name, photo and permission_id will be omitted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.IsMe
member.summary: Whether the user is the authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.Name
member.summary: The displayable name of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.PermissionId
member.summary: The permission ID associated with this user. Equivalent to the Drive API's permission ID for this user, returned as part of the Drive Permissions resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.Photo
member.summary: The profile photo of the user. Not present if the user has no profile photo.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Appsactivity.v1.Data.User.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.
